snippet: The engineering company made several management announcements, aiming to move past the ouster of its chief in July.
abstract: Siemens is appointing SAP co-chief executive Jim Hagemann Snabe to its board to replace Josef Ackermann, who resigned.
lead_paragraph: The engineering company made several management announcements, aiming to move past the ouster of its chief in July.

headline.main: Siemens Appoints a Director From SAP
headline.print_headline: Siemens Appoints A Director From SAP
